    		Health and Human Services Majors
    	 Our MissionOur goal is to increase awareness of majors at CSU, Chico that prepares students to work in health and human services careers. Our intention is to support students as they find an educational path that fits with their skills, abilities, and interests and that will lead to timely graduation and a rewarding career. Find out more about us.
                        Our Majors
                    
                        About Us
                    
                        Find Your Major
                    There will be a special Health and Human Services Majors-themed housing for incoming freshmen in fall 2021. Find more information on the themed housing.Our Task ForceHealth and Human Services Majorshhs@csuchico.eduOther Majors and ProgramsBiology(opens in new window)Child Development(opens in new window)Communication Sciences and Disorders(opens in new window)Communication Studies(opens in new window)Exercise Physiology(opens in new window)Health Services Administration(opens in new window)Journalism and Public Relations(opens in new window)Kinesiology(opens in new window)Nursing(opens in new window)Nutrition and Food Science(opens in new window)Psychology(opens in new window)Public Health(opens in new window)Science Education(opens in new window)Social Science(opens in new window)Social Work(opens in new window)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
